content: I'm currently trying to work out how to run a fully-featured REPL within an anonymous module. I thought it might be easy to just use Base.run_main_repl and have everything set up, however even when run within another module the REPL produced seems to run within Main.
Hmm, I wonder if I might need https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/pull/33872 for this to work completely.
